entry.title: Real Man
entry.summary:
Author: merxurie

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 31,457Chapters: 8/?Kudos: 199

Summary: Bruce Wayne has to do it all. He has to, because he chose this path. No one forced him to be Batman, to be the CEO that Wayne Enterprises needs, to adopt Dick Grayson and love him more everyday. No one forced him into this, really... except that he's suffocating. - In which Bruce wants to be everything to everyone, but he just cannot burden others with all of...him. And Clark Kent is a sucker for kind eyes and has a 'I can fix him' complex.

entry.title: who married professor kent?
entry.summary:
Author: thegonekid

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 29,066Chapters: 7/7Kudos: 590

Summary: Clark KentProfessor in the ENGLISH DEPARTMENTMETROPOLITAN GOTHAM ACADEMY LIT 229Rating: 2/5 "Professor Kent WILL hijack entire lectures to gush about his husband. Doesn’t matter if we’re supposed to be analyzing Shakespeare—suddenly we’re all trapped listening to how ‘incredible’ his husband looked making pancakes. Apparently, love is real and I’m just failing this class because I couldn’t remember what book his husband bought him for their anniversary. Also, he laughs at his own puns. Loudly. All the time. The man is unstoppable. Someone PLEASE tell me who married this menace because I need to know who willingly signed up for this life."Lois Lane, being the investigative journalist she aspires to be, has to unravel the mystery behind her professor's secret husband.

entry.title: KINKTOBER 2025 — Marvel x DC (BL Edition)
entry.summary:
Author: TPWK28HS

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 310Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 2

Summary: Welcome to my Kinktober 2025 collection, dedicated to the Marvel and DC universes and centered on BL (male/male) relationships. This collection features 31 one-shots, one for each day of October, exploring kinks, desires, rivalries, and tenderness between heroes, villains, and everything in between. I'd like readers to participate: if you come up with a Kinktober-themed prompt, please leave it in the comments. I'll choose a few to include in future one-shots in the collection.

entry.title: Devour Me
entry.summary:
Author: TPWK28HS

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,545Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 13

Summary: That night, Bruce Wayne didn’t just lose his parents… he also lost the ability to taste anything. He awakened as a Folk: nothing fills him, nothing can satisfy the emptiness inside. The Joker takes every chance to tempt him, but his flavor, though intense, is so cloying and nauseating that it pushes Bruce to the edge, making him hate Cakes. Until he tastes him.Clark Kent. A reporter who, by accident, reveals himself to be a Cake. But not just any Cake: to Bruce, he’s addictive, igniting him instantly and leaving him with a single desire… to devour him again. Clark promises to keep the secret, but he runs. Bruce won’t allow it. From that moment on, Kent becomes his obsession. Yet Clark, despite all his empathy, hides an even greater secret: he must conceal that he is Superman. He tries to escape this dangerous game, but when his family’s farm is at risk, Bruce offers him a deal he can’t refuse: save it… in exchange for becoming his sustenance. A convenient arrangement… or the beginning of a bond that will devour everything?
